TopicTitle: How to access craft folders from launchpad/runway

Articles.Content: I've noticed when trying to enter the launchpad or runway from KSC that only crafts under the root directory of the craft folder system show up to be launched, and I can't see how to access the subfolders or search for craft in them. How can I do this?

Sorry to resurrect this old thread but I have the same issue, surprisingly this seems to be the only post on the entire internet addressing it/asking for a solution. Has anyone found a solution for the newest version yet? I'm on 1.12.3 and the problem persists.
I do not believe the folder functionality was ever added to the runway or launchpad.  Rather it was only added to the VAB and SPH.
